name: Youth Unity for Voluntary Action
briefDescription: Yuva is working to raise the status of the underprivileged, illiterate, poor and backward people through developing the human resources. Target groups of YUVA are the poorer and vulnerable segment of the society living below the poverty line with primary focus on the Tribal and other Backward Classes of people along with special coverage for the distressed women , the neglected children and distracted youths. Our organisation extends Support to the economically weaker sections of the community like daily wage earners or landless laborers
